answers.question: Is your project a member or past grantee of one of these networks?

answers.answer:
- Activate Regen Eliza on ElizaOS and other study the implementation on other AI Agent Frameworks

- Activate Social Media accounts to be ready to interact

- Activate the interaction with the accounts from organizers of this round

- Train Regen Eliza with content from ReFi Podcast

- Add the content from ReFiDAO Blog to "education package" to Regen Eliza the education.

- Add an updated-knowledge package from ReFiDAO newsletters into the Regen Eliza 

- Add the knowledge package from Green Pill Books and Gitcoin Content to Regen Eliza

- Activate Regen Eliza Wallet to interact with the projects inside Regen Coordination

- Make initial deployment of Regen Eliza during Q2, 2025

- Activate Regen Eliza with Web3 Social Media DApps during Q2, 2025

- Implement AI tools to Regen Eliza

- Implement multi-sign and accounting knowledge to the Wallet Management module.

- Start Regen Eliza transparent Impact-Wallet utilizing different Stablecoin on the CELO Network
answers.question: What are your key active goals, plans, objectives or milestones for this year?

project.title: ReFi Starter ðŸ¤–ðŸŒ± Agentic Regeneration
project.description:
[![Regen-Eliza-Green-Hoodie-Re-Fi-DAO-background.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/y6Qc189t/Regen-Eliza-Green-Hoodie-Re-Fi-DAO-background.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/z3hVp5xF)

**ReFi Starter** keeps pushing forward, and this time we introduce the AI Agent we are building to assist not only ReFi Starter Launchpad but all the Regen Ecosystem, starting with the communities organizing and sponsoring this round.


> _**Regen-Agent as a Service**_ > It is well known the Agents are here to stay, we continue making emphasis on the importance of AI for Impact, as we believe is the going to be the most powerful equation between Web3/Crypto and Technology for Good/ReFi.

We are not against "Meme Agents", but such a powerful technology should be utilized to bring more positive results in a world were environmental, social and nature problems increase everyday.


We are proposing the development of Regen Eliza, emerging from the Gitcoin trenches, ReGen Eliza is an AI Agent trained to serve the Regen Ecosystem â€” helping communicate, coordinate, and co-activate regenerative projects across Web3.

DISCLAIMER
Regen Eliza is an independent initiative and is not affiliated with ElizaOS Team. While it draws from open-source code and creative assets, Regen Eliza is a separate and original development emerged as the agent in charge of assisting the ReFi Starter Platform.




> https://x.com/elizaregen < AI Agent Account



> _Infusion of Personalities_

- Paul Hawken, author of The Ecology of Commerce

- Toni Lane Casey

- Captain Paul Watson (Sea Shepherd)
(under construction)


> First communities to interact with:

- Regen Coordination
- ReFiDAO
- GreenPill Network
- Celo Public Goods
- Let's GROW



[![regen-GG23-Celo-Regen-Coordi.png](https://i.postimg.cc/q7NhykqJ/regen-GG23-Celo-Regen-Coordi.png)](https://postimg.cc/QBrdrZcw)




> Calendars to track:

- Global Environmental Calendar
- Gitcoin rounds
- ETH Global Agenda
- Funding the Commons schedule
- Octant rounds 




> She will start to learning from:

- Notes from calls
- Twitter Spaces
- Publications
- Articles
- Newsletters
- Chatting with Regens


> "She" will be acquiring knowledge form the next narratives:
- DeSci
- Soc Fi
- AI 
- Regenerative Finance
- Solar Punk movement
- Regenerative Business Models
- Privacy 
- Scientific papers




> First Social Media to be Activated:

- Farcaster
- Twitter
- Telegram
- Discord
- Instagram
- Email




> Regen Eliza will not be alone, other projects would be able to launch and leverage "her" technology and  activate other agents. Limited spots would be available, to avoid over-populating the ecosystem.


[![2-elizas-celo-banner.png](https://i.postimg.cc/sgbY1G51/2-elizas-celo-banner.png)](https://postimg.cc/87BJ05KV)


>  The skills of our Agents include:

âœ… Project Activity Analysis â€“ Tracks accounts of projects, activity on social media, wallet activity.

âœ… Shout outs for upcoming events, hackathons, CPG initiatives, and events by Local Nodes.

âœ… Impact-Driven Agent Interaction â€“ Uses AI to assess live KPIs, community sentiment, and project deliveries to engage with active projects.

âœ… Automated Smart Connections between projects - It make match making with projects we are not connected yet, and connect them via tagging on Twitter.

âœ… Wallet Management - It has the ability to create wallet, create multi-sign, assign new wallet to other wallets, distribution and manage cryptocurrency.

âœ… DevRel Skillset - Enhances developer engagement, education, and community support by automating key interactions and providing real-time assistance according to what the developers are looking for. Gathers all SDK, API, repositories and useful links for Devs to have a 24/7 assistance.

âœ… Decentralized & Trustless Execution â€“ Operates on smart contracts, reducing reliance on intermediaries and eliminating funding inefficiencies.

âœ… Trained to be objecting, and focus on the reach of each proposal, independently of the subject or person behind. This helps the blockers for over political decisions or human ideologies, which can stop Regeneration.

âœ… Adaptive Funding Mechanisms â€“ Implements new forms of funding, Retroactive Public Goods Funding, sponsored funding, and DAO delegation funding. 

âœ… Project Evaluation
Review previous performance criteria, ensuring alignment with industry standards.
Analyze GitHub activity, code repositories, and technical quality to assess development progress and security.
Evaluate team qualifications, expertise, and track record to determine execution capability.
Rank social reach, community engagement, and credibility across Web3 networks.
Conduct market analysis, identifying opportunities, risks, and problem relevance for sustainable impact.

âœ… Project & Product Progress Tracking
Monitor progress and proof of deliveries through onchain verification and real-world reporting.
Ensure transparent use of funds by tracking spending efficiency and milestone completion.
Review the deliverables and adoption or key performance indicators each project

âœ… Smart connector AI Agent - Scout for active donors or grantors who express interest on Technology for Good, Impact Investing, Decentralized Science, Social Finance, DePiN, and other criteria. It outlook for engagement, trust-building, and communication between projects and investors, ensuring efficient capital flow and long-term partnerships.





[![gitcoin-coin-hear.png](https://i.postimg.cc/jdh06dBv/gitcoin-coin-hear.png)](https://postimg.cc/hfh5cgD7)



_**Bring me to life**_



[![Regen-eliza-Green-Hoodie-coding.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/250h1kM1/Regen-eliza-Green-Hoodie-coding.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/t1VYfjXb)

It outlook for engagement, trust-building, and communication between projects and investors, ensuring efficient capital flow and long-term partnerships.
